'''This specification depends on DistributionDefaultsAndBranding and UbuntuDownUnder/BOFs/BrandingForDerivatives'''

=== Summary ===

Gather and document best best practices for branding Ubuntu derivative distributions.

=== Rationale ===

It has been two years since this issue has been looked at.  In those two years, several derivatives have had experience branding their distributions.  Their experience and knowledge should be documented.  Additionally, they will have feedback on how Ubuntu can make branding derivative easier and more efficient.
